HomePage.subtitle: Empowering Singapore SMEs with intelligent Chatbot automation, custom SaaS solutions, and seamless digital experiences.
HomePage.ready_subtitle: Let's discuss how we can tailor our solutions to your unique needs.

AIShowcase.title: Intelligent Automation for Growth
AIShowcase.subtitle: Transform your customer engagement with our AI-powered chatbots. Designed for seamless lead generation, 24/7 support, and instant CRM synchronization.
AIShowcase.feature_1_desc: Capture and qualify leads automatically, even when you sleep.
AIShowcase.feature_2_desc: Resolve common queries instantly with AI that understands context.
AIShowcase.feature_3_desc: Automatically push qualified leads to your favorite CRM tools.
AIShowcase.msg_hello: Hello! How can I help you automate your business today?
AIShowcase.msg_user: I'm looking for a chatbot for my e-commerce store.
AIShowcase.msg_response: Excellent choice! Our AI chatbots can handle product inquiries, order tracking, and even checkout. Would you like to see a demo?

TechGrid.title: Comprehensive Digital Solutions
TechGrid.subtitle: Beyond AI, we build the fundamental digital infrastructure your business needs to thrive.
TechGrid.service_1_desc: Native and cross-platform mobile apps that engage your customers on the go.
TechGrid.service_2_desc: Streamline your retail operations with our cloud-based Point of Sale solutions.
TechGrid.service_3_desc: Scalable online stores integrated with local payment gateways and logistics.

Footer.company_desc: Empowering Singapore SMEs with intelligent digital solutions.
